oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Die Balkan-Halbinsel in 4 Blättern: Türkei, Rumänien, Griechenland, Serbien, Montenegro, Bulgarien
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vogel, C. (Carl) , 1828-1897
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University Harvard Map Collection, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: entworfen von C. Vogel ; bearbeitet von B. Domann ; gestochen von Kern, Kühn u. Weiler.
Covers Bosnia und Herzegovina, Croatia, Montenegro, Greece, Serbia, Romania, Bulgaria, Macedonia and portions of Turkey.
Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by bathymetry.

Insets: Constantinopel (Scale 1:150,000) -- Athens und Piraeus (Scale 1:150,000) -- Das Nördliche Rümanien im Anschluss and die Hauptkarte (Scale 1:1,500,000) -- Strasse der Dardanellen (Scale 1:150,000) -- Der Bosporus (Scale 1:150,000).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Scale 1:1,500,000(E 18°--E 29°/N 45°--N 35°).
Balkan Peninsula
